name: Mike & Igor
description:
Welcome to Mike & Igor.

Mike & Igor attempts to poke fun at RPG Maker games made by venting 12 year olds while trying to assemble some self-awareness.

In this game, evil is in the form of a limbless individual - Torso-Dude. Torso-Dude wages war on Mike and Igor after blowing up their dog. Are you willing enough to guide them to victory?

Features :

  • Sprites handcrafted to look like shit.
  • (Some) Original music.
  • Crude dialogue.
  • Clyde from high school.

Challenges (if you care) :

  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.
  • Only use the pencil tool.

This game was made in 7 days for MS Paint Jam. (https://itch.io/jam/paint-jam-but-long-this-time-2021)
